properties.description: Open to anyone in the community. Book Swap is held in the large hall. We have hot drinks, a variety of cakes and a wide selection of books available to borrow.

properties.description: Baby&Me for carers and under 1s meets from 9.30-11.30. If you don’t have a little one, please feel free to sit in another area of the church. In the afternoon from 2-3.30, Chat over a Cuppa takes place - a chance to meet others over a (free!) hot drink
properties.title: Christ Church Eaton

properties.description: Open from 03/01/2023. We are a city centre church based here in Norwich we have a range of activities that run each week, here’s what’s happening at the times we’ve listed, so you can work out whether each activity is right for you to attend: Mondays – closed Tuesdays – 10:00
properties.title: CityGates Church Norwich

properties.description: Open from 09/01/23. We would love to welcome you to King's! Our Mondays are aimed towards the over 65's and Wednesdays the focus is towards families (Primary aged children or younger). Our new Thursday warm space is open to all. Our warm spaces run on Mondays with activities, free refreshments and an option for a hot lunch (small fee). On Wednesdays we offer a homework club, lego challenge and free refreshments. On Thursdays we offer games, craft space and a free drink and snack.
